[++Difficulty Change++]

[Normal]
B05C5CEC 00000000
2000003D 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{The strength of the enemies already on the map does not change.
Only the new appear enemies will change strength.}

[Hard]
B05C5CEC 00000000
2000003D 00000001 
D2000000 00000000
{The strength of the enemies already on the map does not change.
Only the new appear enemies will change strength.}

[--]
